Service Details: - Offers a wide variety of events and resources for women, including a full library of books and magazines- Creates a safe atmosphere which fosters the bonds of support and friendship between women, which is fully inclusive of all, regardless of race, ethnicity, age, ability, class, nationality, sexuality, and religious or political affiliation- Seeks the full equality of women, promotes an awareness of women’s issues on campus and in the community, and strives toward the elimination of all barriers to post-secondary education for women- Volunteer opportunities available
Address & Map: 3333 University Way, UNC 132Kelowna, BC     V1V 1V7View MapQuest Map
